greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of product_{k=1..n-1} (1 + 1/prime(k)).
reference: G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, 5th ed., Oxford Univ. Press, 1979; Theorem 429.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
J. Sondow and E. Weisstein, MathWorld: Mertens Theorem
formula: A236436(n) / a(n) = product_{k=1..n-1} (1 + 1/prime(k)) ~ (6/Pi^2)*exp(gamma)*log(n) as n -> infinity, by Mertens' theorem.
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_, Feb 01 2014
